description: This pair of Kundanalu is a vibrant expression of South Indian artistry. The combination of precious gemstones and the intricate setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship. A classic yet modern design that will be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. The array of colors makes it versatile and easy to pair with various outfits.
